scripts.clean: cd system_uri && cargo clean && cd ../native/safe_app && cargo clean
scripts.build-system-uri-release: cd system_uri && cargo build --release && cd ../ && cp -f system_uri/target/release/*system_uri* ./src/native
scripts.build-safe-lib-release: cd native/safe_app && cargo build --release && cd ../../ && cp -f native/target/release/*safe_app* ./src/native
scripts.build-libs-release: npm run build-system-uri-release && npm run build-safe-app-release
scripts.build-system-uri: cd system_uri && cargo build && cd ../ && cp -f system_uri/target/debug/*system_uri* ./src/native
scripts.build-safe-lib: cd native/safe_app && cargo build --features "use-mock-routing testing" && cd ../../ && cp -rf native/target/debug/deps/*safe_app* ./src/native
scripts.build-libs: npm run build-system-uri && npm run build-safe-lib
scripts.docs: documentation build --config etc/documentation.yml --github true --output docs --format html src/**
scripts.serve-docs: documentation serve --config etc/documentation.yml --github true --output docs --format html src/**
